name: Clean the ocean! (TheLeoDeveloper)
description:
How to play?

-Take the garbage out of the ocean with different tools!

-Hover over the garbage and take it with left click, than drag it out of the ocean and  than click again to collect it.

-Use fishing net to take out small garbage

-Use pipe to clean up oil leaks

-Use crane to take heavy garbage out of the ocean like abandoned car and abandoned ship

-tab - switch tool

-esc - go to main menu

Made by TheLeoDeveloper
Discord server
